fields.name: Overview
fields.value: Kotlin is a cross-platform, statically typed, general-purpose programming language with type inference. It is designed to interoperate fully with Java. Kotlin was designed by JetBrains and first appeared on July 22, 2011.

fields.name: Features
fields.value:
- Allows writing less code
- Adopting Kotlin is easy
- Fully compatible with Java
- No runtime overhead
- Strong community
- Suited for multi-platform development
- Kotlin development offers more safety
